14 boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> PclFilters::visualize(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud)
15 {
16  viewer.reset(new pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer ("3D Viewer",false));
17  viewer->addPointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> (cloud, "sample cloud");
18  viewer->initCameraParameters ();
19  return (viewer);
20 }

22 boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> PclFilters::visualize_rgb(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr cloud)
23 {
24  viewer.reset(new pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer ("3D Viewer",false));
25  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerRGBField<pcl::PointXYZRGB> rgb(cloud);
26  viewer->addPointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> (cloud, rgb, "sample cloud");
27  viewer->initCameraParameters ();
28  return (viewer);
29 }

31 boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> PclFilters::normalsVis(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double radius, int numOfNormals)
32 {
33  viewer.reset(new pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer ("3D Viewer",false));
34  viewer->addPointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> (cloud, "sample cloud");
35  viewer->addPointCloudNormals<pcl::PointXYZ, pcl::Normal> (cloud, get_normals(cloud,radius), numOfNormals, 0.05, "normals");
36  viewer->setPointCloudRenderingProperties (pcl::visualization::PCL_VISUALIZER_COLOR, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0, "normals");
37  viewer->initCameraParameters ();
38  filteredCloud = cloud;
39  return (viewer);
40 }

67 std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr> PclFilters::cluster_extraction(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double distance)
68 {
69  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_f (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>), outcloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
70  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr incloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
71  pcl::copyPointCloud(*cloud,*incloud);
72 
73  // Create the segmentation object for the planar model and set all the parameters
74  pcl::SACSegmentation<pcl::PointXYZ> seg;
75  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr inliers (new pcl::PointIndices);
76  pcl::ModelCoefficients::Ptr coefficients (new pcl::ModelCoefficients);
77  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_plane (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> ());
78  seg.setOptimizeCoefficients (true);
79  seg.setModelType (pcl::SACMODEL_PLANE);
80  seg.setMethodType (pcl::SAC_RANSAC);
81  seg.setMaxIterations (100);
82  seg.setDistanceThreshold (distance);
83 
84  int i=0, nr_points = (int) incloud->points.size ();
85  while (incloud->points.size () > 0.3 * nr_points)
86  {
87  // Segment the largest planar component from the remaining cloud
88  seg.setInputCloud (incloud);
89  seg.segment (*inliers, *coefficients);
90  if (inliers->indices.size () == 0)
91  {
92  std::cout << "Could not estimate a planar model for the given dataset." << std::endl;
93  break;
94  }
95 
96  // Extract the planar inliers from the input cloud
97  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::PointXYZ> extract;
98  extract.setInputCloud (incloud);
99  extract.setIndices (inliers);
100  extract.setNegative (false);
101 
102  // Get the points associated with the planar surface
103  extract.filter (*cloud_plane);
104 
105  // Remove the planar inliers, extract the rest
106  extract.setNegative (true);
107  extract.filter (*cloud_f);
108  *incloud = *cloud_f;
109  }
110 
111  // Creating the KdTree object for the search method of the extraction
112  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>);
113  tree->setInputCloud (incloud);
114 
115  std::vector<pcl::PointIndices> cluster_indices;
116  pcl::EuclideanClusterExtraction<pcl::PointXYZ> ec;
117  ec.setClusterTolerance (0.02); // 2cm
118  ec.setMinClusterSize (100);
119  ec.setMaxClusterSize (25000);
120  ec.setSearchMethod (tree);
121  ec.setInputCloud (incloud);
122  ec.extract (cluster_indices);
123 
124  int j = 0;
125  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr> clusters;
126  for (std::vector<pcl::PointIndices>::const_iterator it = cluster_indices.begin (); it != cluster_indices.end (); ++it)
127  {
128  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_cluster (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
129  for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator pit = it->indices.begin (); pit != it->indices.end (); ++pit)
130  cloud_cluster->points.push_back (incloud->points[*pit]);
131  cloud_cluster->width = cloud_cluster->points.size ();
132  cloud_cluster->height = 1;
133  cloud_cluster->is_dense = true;
134  clusters.push_back(cloud_cluster);
135  //add all clusters to a single point cloud as the last edited point cloud
136  if(j == 0)
137  {
138  outcloud = cloud_cluster;
139  }
140  else
141  {
142  *outcloud += *cloud_cluster;
143  }
144  j++;
145  }
146  filteredCloud = outcloud;
147  return (clusters);
148 }
149 
150 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::plane_segmentation(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double distance)
151 {
152  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr incloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
153  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_plane (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
154  pcl::copyPointCloud(*cloud,*incloud);
155  pcl::ModelCoefficients::Ptr coefficients (new pcl::ModelCoefficients);
156  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr inliers (new pcl::PointIndices);
157  // Create the segmentation object
158  pcl::SACSegmentation<pcl::PointXYZ> seg;
159  // Optional
160  seg.setOptimizeCoefficients (true);
161  // Mandatory
162  seg.setModelType (pcl::SACMODEL_PLANE);
163  seg.setMethodType (pcl::SAC_RANSAC);
164  seg.setDistanceThreshold (distance);
165  seg.setInputCloud (cloud);
166  seg.segment (*inliers, *coefficients);
167 
168  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::PointXYZ> extract;
169  extract.setInputCloud (incloud);
170  extract.setIndices (inliers);
171  extract.setNegative (false);
172 
173  // Get the points associated with the planar surface
174  extract.filter (*cloud_plane);
175 
176  filteredCloud = cloud;
177  return (cloud_plane);
178 }
179 
180 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::get_filtered_cloud()
181 {
182  return filteredCloud;
183 }
184 
185 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr PclFilters::color_cloud(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, int r, int g, int b)
186 {
187  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr rgb_cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
188  pcl::copyPointCloud(*cloud,*rgb_cloud);
189 
190  //color all points white
191  for (int i = 0; i< rgb_cloud->points.size(); i++)
192  {
193  rgb_cloud->points[i].r = r;
194  rgb_cloud->points[i].g = g;
195  rgb_cloud->points[i].b = b;
196  }
197  return (rgb_cloud);
198 }
199 
200 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr PclFilters::get_normals(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double radius)
201 {
202  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr normals_out (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>);
203  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ> ());
204  pcl::NormalEstimationOMP<pcl::PointXYZ, pcl::Normal> norm_est;
205  norm_est.setSearchMethod(tree);
206  norm_est.setRadiusSearch (radius);
207  norm_est.setInputCloud (cloud);
208  //norm_est.setSearchSurface (cloud);
209  norm_est.compute (*normals_out);
210  return (normals_out);
211 }
212 
213 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::passthrough(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double min, double max, std::string axis)
214 {
215  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
216  passfilter.setInputCloud(cloud);
217  passfilter.setFilterFieldName(axis);
218  passfilter.setFilterLimits(min,max);
219  passfilter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
220  filteredCloud = cloud_filtered;
221  return (cloud_filtered);
222 }
223 
224 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::voxelgrid(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double lx, double ly, double lz)
225 {
226  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
227  voxelfilter.setInputCloud(cloud);
228  voxelfilter.setLeafSize(lx,ly,lz);
229  voxelfilter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
230  filteredCloud = cloud_filtered;
231  return (cloud_filtered);
232 }
233 
234 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::median(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, int window_size, double max_allowed_movement)
235 {
236  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
237  medianfilter.setInputCloud(cloud);
238  medianfilter.setWindowSize(window_size);
239  medianfilter.setMaxAllowedMovement(max_allowed_movement);
240  medianfilter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
241  filteredCloud = cloud_filtered;
242  return (cloud_filtered);
243 }
244 
245 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::shadowpoint(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double threshold, double radius)
246 {
247  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
248  shadowpoint_filter.setInputCloud(cloud);
249  shadowpoint_filter.setThreshold(threshold);
250  shadowpoint_filter.setNormals(get_normals(cloud, radius));
251  shadowpoint_filter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
252  filteredCloud = cloud_filtered;
253  return (cloud_filtered);
254 }
255 
256 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::statistical_outlier(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, int meanK, double std_deviation_threshold)
257 {
258  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
259  //statistical_outlier_filter.setKeepOrganized(true);
260  statistical_outlier_filter.setInputCloud(cloud);
261  statistical_outlier_filter.setMeanK(meanK);
262  statistical_outlier_filter.setStddevMulThresh(std_deviation_threshold);
263  statistical_outlier_filter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
264  filteredCloud = cloud_filtered;
265  return (cloud_filtered);
266 }
267 
268 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::combine_clouds(std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr> input)
269 {
270  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cluster_cloud;
271  cluster_cloud = input.at(0);
272  for (unsigned i=0; i<input.size(); i++){
273  *cluster_cloud += *(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr) input.at(i);
274  }
275  return (cluster_cloud);
276 
277 }
278 }
